title: Introduction to SRA Aligned Read Format and Cloud Metadata for SARS-CoV-2
questions: What is the SRA Aligned Read Format
objectives: Understand which data and metadata types are available for SARS-CoV-2 SRA runs in the cloud.
Understand what SRA Aligned Read Format is and what can you do with it.
Working knowledge of SRA Metadata available on the cloud, ways to access it, and some popular use cases.

tutorial.description: This tutorial will walk you through accessing and using SRA Aligned read format in Galaxy.

materials.title: SRA Aligned Read Formats to Speed Up SARS-CoV-2 data Analysis
From NCBI's Sequence Read Archive (SRA) to Galaxy: SARS-CoV-2 variant analysis

tutorial.title: SRA Aligned Read Format to Speed Up SARS-CoV-2 data Analysis

slides.description: This lecture will introduce the SRA Aligned Read format available in the cloud from SRA, as well as some accompanying metadata that can help you search and filter the data. This sessions is aimed specifically at SARS-CoV-2 runs in SRA.

materials.title: Introduction to SRA Aligned Read Format and Cloud Metadata for SARS-CoV-2

slides.title: SRA Aligned Read Format to Speed Up SARS-CoV-2 data Analysis

session.title: SRA Aligned read format in Galaxy
session.description: This session will introduce the SRA Aligned Read format, and show you how to use this in Galaxy to analyze a SARS-CoV-2 dataset.
